newsitem.title: USA: Xcellenet names CFO Sack COO, exec VP.
newsitem.headline: Xcellenet names CFO Sack COO, exec VP.

text.p: XcelleNet Inc said on Friday it had promoted chief financial officer Sidney V. Sack to executive vice president and chief operating officer.
As chief operating officer, Sack will be responsible for global sales, customer operations and relationships with Microsoft Solution Partners and other channel partners.

Sack joined XcelleNet as CFO in September 1990 after 10 years in financial and operational management positions with several software companies in Atlanta. Further details were not immediately available.
In other management changes, the company said Robert I. Apollo was recently hired as vice president and general manager - Europe and will report to Sack.
Joseph W. Owen also was recently promoted to vice president of product technology. He joined XcelleNet in 1989 and was director of product management in the marketing department.
